title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2165/84 of 26 July 1984 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1203/73 fixing the conversion factors to be applied to the buying-in prices for fruit and vegetables
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2165/84
of 26 July 1984
amending Regulation (EEC) No 1203/73 fixing the conversion factors to be applied to the buying-in prices for fruit and vegetables
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Regulation (EEC) No 1203/73 in Annex VII 'Apples', under the heading 'Variety conversion factor' the variety Granny Smith is added to the list entitled 'List of varieties of large dessert apples'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 August 1984.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 July 1984.
For the Commission
Poul DALSAGER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 118, 20. 5. 1972, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 130, 16. 5. 1984, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 123, 10. 5. 1973, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 176, 3. 7. 1984, p. 27.
